name: EncryptConfig
author: Mohammed Jawed
helpMarkDown: Encrypt section of Config File Using aspnet_regiis.

inputs.name: configFilePath
inputs.label: Config File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of Config file to be Encrypted.

inputs.name: dataProtectionProvider
inputs.label: Encryption Provider To Use
inputs.helpMarkDown: Data Protection Provider to use for Encryption.

inputs.name: SectionToCommentsInConfig
inputs.label: Comment Section of Config
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option in case you want to comment section of config before Encrytion.

inputs.name: ToComment
inputs.label: Section from config to comment Before Encryption
inputs.helpMarkDown: Section from config to comment Before Encryption.

inputs.name: sectionName
inputs.label: Section of Config file to be Encrypted
inputs.helpMarkDown: Section of Config file to be Encrypted

inputs.name: Recursive
inputs.label: Recursive?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Mark this boolean field if the file search should be recursive, that is, to apply the encryption to all the files matching the pattern in all sub folders. Unmark the field if the file search should not be recursive: in this case, web.config files in the sub folders will not be considered for encryption for the pattern web.config.
